TEXT.TITLE: EPSILON DATA <EPSI> GETS NEW CREDIT AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Epsilon Data Management Inc said it had executed a new revolving credit and term loan agreement with the Shawmut Bank N.A. It said the total credit available under the newly-signed agreement is six mln dlrs. It said the new agreement will, at its option, convert to a four-year term loan in September 1988. Reuter
